changeSet.sql:
create table operation ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, created_by INTEGER NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_by INTEGER NOT NULL,
fk_bank_account INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES bank_account (id),
operation_source TEXT NOT NULL, amount NUMERIC NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: siarhei.piashko
siarhei.piashko
changeSet.sql:
create table money_transfer ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, created_by INTEGER NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_by INTEGER NOT NULL,
fk_send_operation INTEGER REFERENCES operation (id) NOT NULL, fk_receive_operation INTEGER REFERENCES operation (id) NOT NULL,
amount NUMERIC NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: siarhei.piashko
changeSet.sql:
create table cash_action ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, created_by INTEGER NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_by INTEGER NOT NULL,
action_type TEXT NOT NULL, cash_amount NUMERIC NOT NULL,
fk_refill_operation INTEGER REFERENCES operation (id) CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'REFILL') OR (fk_refill_operation IS NOT NULL)),
fk_withdrawal_operation INTEGER REFERENCES operation (id) CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'WITHDRAWAL') OR (fk_withdrawal_operation IS NOT NULL)), included_fee NUMERIC CHECK ((NOT action_type = 'WITHDRAWAL') OR (included_fee IS NOT NULL)) );
